children.name: limit_maximum_content_width_on_site_header
children.label: Limit maximum content width on Site header

children.name: custom_container_width
children.label: Custom container width
children.help_text: By default, when checkbox is enabled, this module matches the width of the general page content width. This option allows you to adjust it.

children.name: logo_on_mobile
children.label: Logo on mobile
children.help_text: Logotype adjustments for small/mobile screen viewports

children.name: dropdown_style
children.label: Dropdown style
choices: Limit max width / height on dropdown and content
Full width dropdown, limit max width on content
Full screen dropdown, limit max width on content

children.name: number_of_columns
children.label: Number of columns
children.help_text: Number of columns in desktop resolutions

children.name: show_title
children.label: Show first level title
children.help_text: Show the title of the first level before the next menu levels.

children.name: menu
children.label: Menu
children.help_text: If no menu is selected, the name "main_navigation" will be used as the default main menu

children.name: max_level
children.label: Max level
children.help_text: Maximum depth level for navigation menu

children.name: accessible_links
children.label: Accessible links
children.help_text: Inform if a link opens a new window.

children.name: show_current_language
children.label: Show current language
children.help_text: Show current language in the site header

children.name: show_language_code
children.label: Show language code
children.help_text: Show current language as language code

children.name: show_current_language
children.label: Show current language
children.help_text: Show current language in the dropdown

children.name: display_mode
children.label: Display mode
children.help_text: The language of the text in the language switcher. PageLang means the names of languages will display in the language of the page the switcher is on. Localized means the name of each language will display in that language. Hybrid is a combination of the two.

children.name: use_custom_search_results_page
children.label: Use custom search results page
children.inline_help_text: Turn this setting on to use a custom search results page instead of the default global search results page.

children.name: enable_language_specific_search
children.label: Enable language specific search
children.inline_help_text: When language-specific search is enabled, the search input will align with the page's language and display results only in the corresponding language.

children.name: accessible_link
children.label: Accessible link
children.help_text: Accessible link. Inform when a link opens a new window.

children.name: accessible_link_label
children.label: Accessible link label
children.help_text: If the link title is added at the end of repeated blocks of text, for example âRead moreâ links at the end of short teasers for blog posts, then you can provide more descriptive link text specifically for screen reader users using Accessible link label. It will be visually hidden for a normal view.
